title.rendered: Digiperform Training is worth attending as compared to other institutes.

content.rendered:
Meet Digiperformer Kaipa Sai Kaundinya from Bengaluru. He’s a Certified Digital Marketer from Digiperform Indiranagar – Bengaluru. Currently, working as an SEO Executive in GoLearn Analytics. About the company: GoLearn Analytics is run by experts with rich experience in the IT and data analytics Industry. They offer a definite edge in career by teaching the latest and most sought after technologies like machine learning. When we asked him, Why he decided to learn digital marketing and joined Digiperform? Here is a small transcript of the conversation we had with Kaipa while congratulating him for his new job role.   Have a look!

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Kaipa: Hi. I’m Kaipa Sai Kaundinya. I’m a certified digital marketer. Currently, I’m working as an SEO executive in GoLearn Analytics.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Kaipa: I have always been passionate about learning new stuff especially if it’s related to the internet. You can call me an internet freak. So, while interrogating about new online discoveries, I got to know about digital marketing and realized that I could tune my passion into my career. Yeah! So, here I am – a Proud Digital Marketer!

Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Kaipa: I loved the training modules of Digiperform. It has covered all parameters of online marketing that one needs to know to be a perfect digital marketer. Your training team and faculty are also amazing. They are quite friendly and easy to talk to.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Kaipa: The way training was conducted. And, the response was excellent. I had attended demo sessions of other digital marketing institutes as well. Digiperform training is worth to attend as compared to other training institutes.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Kaipa: Yes, Definitely. Digiperform is good for digital marketing training. All credit goes to your training team and faculty. Hats off to you guys! 😀

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Kaipa: I would give a perfect 9 out of 10. 

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Kaipa: As if now, I am only concentrating to be the Best Digital Marketer of my country. I hope I’m not hoping too much. 😀

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Kaipa: Everyone who wants to learn digital marketing, focus on theoretical as well as practical classes. Live practical sessions help you to absorb the best.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Kaipa: Awesome institute compared to others in Bangalore. Training is Awesome. Faculty is Awesome. In short, Digiperform is Awesome. Digiperform: Thanks, Kaipa for such valuable feedback. You will definitely become the best digital marketer with such a positive attitude. We wish you good luck.
